channel.title: Blog on Arunaad | Ecommerce Site
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Arunaad | Ecommerce Site

item.title: Cheesy masala papad Receipe
item.description: Take 100 gms of your favourite UnWe coin papad and fry/bake it as per your liking. Put some chopped veggies like onion,tomato,cucumber and raw mango ,along with some lemon juice on it.

item.title: Khakra Papad Receipe
item.description: Take UnWE coin papad either fry/baked one by one and apply pure ghee on them. Sprinkle some UnWE masala over it and enjoy the snack.

item.title: Masala Papad Receipe
item.description: Take 100 gms of your favourite UnWe coin papad and fry/bake it as per your liking. Put some chopped veggies like onion,tomato,cucumber and raw mango ,along with some lemon juice on it.
